text: Craven County is a county in the U.S. state of North Carolina. In 2020, 100,720 people lived there. Its county seat is New Bern. == Communities == === Cities === * Havelock * New Bern (county seat) === Towns === * Bridgeton * Cove City * Dover * River Bend * Trent Woods * Vanceboro === Census-designated places === * Brices Creek * Fairfield Harbour * James City * Neuse Forest ==References== Category:North Carolina counties Category:18th-century establishments in North Carolina Category:1712 establishments in the Thirteen Colonies
title: Craven County, North Carolina
